email_body: Must be nice to be a Wall Street executive "Frank F. Zerilli" <fzerilli@optonline.net> on 08/23/2000 10:11:35 PM To: jarnold@enron.com cc: Subject: Vacation John, I will be out of the office vacationing up in Martha's Vineyard with the family through Labor Day. Good Luck with Debby...talk to you in Sep.
